title: Redefining the F-Word
description: Karuna is a passionate supporter of women’s rights. With an upbringing in a third world country, Karuna’s enthusiasm for feminism is tied closely to her roots, where women are largely more disadvantaged than their male counterparts. Full of curiosity and a fervour to explore, Karuna hopes to combine her knowledge and passion to address this societal problem.
author: Karuna Taesopapong
